content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price was 700 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate my satisfaction with the outcome as an 8.
name: Max Müller
